R

recursiveReverseDeckCopy(ModelFlashCardDeck, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Recursive method to copy the deck in reverse.
refreshButtonsAndCounters() - Method in class ControllerMain
Refreshes the buttons to enable or disable based on what the user is allowed to do.
removeAll() - Method in class ModelFlashCardDeck
Empties the deck by running ModelFlashCardDeck.dequeue() until there is no more cards left.
replaceCard(ModelFlashCard) - Method in class ModelFlashCardDeck
When a card data is updated, this method cycles through the entire deck and update the deck on the corresponding card ID.
resetDeck() - Method in class ControllerMain
Empties the Memorized Deck and Main Deck and recopies all cards from the Complete Deck.
resetEditCardWindow() - Method in class ControllerMain
Used by outside classes to update the colors and text on the JDialog before making it visible.
restore() - Method in class ControllerMain
Dequeue all the cards in memorized deck and move them over to the main deck.
